post.body: yeah.. mu cuz.. ill tell u abt him in mpl.. interesting char ..
haan.. i know.. hehe.. vaise humari koi hoti toh hum sab bhi busy hote.. ;)
kya bhaiya?? bilkul id ka chand ban gaye ho?
see "memento" you might prefer it to ghajini.. its a christopher nolan flik..
get interested ppl dere atleast.. anomitg, sam_sun,ashish bhaiya, tushar, tsudot,shashank are kinda dormant?
We need to first make ppl signup for these lists else no use :(
thanks.. i signed up.. have put up a thread for the list..
as all of u say.. its a collective effort..
okay.. u people decide then.. its not just abt the media.. we need it for posters fliers etc..
the dates are set so because then we can get funding frm fedora in Q1..
We'll have to promote the magazine too.. Posters for that too i guess?
We'll announce it before them.. as soon as college begins.. Posters are important.. hardly any1 checks their site..
: we have discussed it.. fedora Q4 is already done.. 1st march is the 1st day of Q1 2009. thats why its been set..
Happy new year everyone.. tym to make resolutions.. <which will eventually be broken :D>
The forum which was alive for a few hours is dead again.. sigh
we can hold workshops on python etc before that? will give people some preparations for hackathon too??just an idea..
